code: export var TOGGLE_SIGNUP_MODAL='TOGGLE_SIGNUP_MODAL';export var SET_USER_LOGGED_IN='SET_USER_LOGGED_IN';export var SET_CUSTOMER_DATA='SET_CUSTOMER_DATA';export var SET_USER_LOGGED_OUT='SET_USER_LOGGED_OUT';export var SHOW_SIGNUP_MODAL='SHOW_SIGNUP_MODAL';export var HIDE_SIGNUP_MODAL='HIDE_SIGNUP_MODAL';export var toggleSignupModal=function toggleSignupModal(){return{type:TOGGLE_SIGNUP_MODAL};};export var setUserLoggedIn=function setUserLoggedIn(){return{type:SET_USER_LOGGED_IN};};export var setUserLoggedOut=function setUserLoggedOut(){return{type:SET_USER_LOGGED_OUT};};export var setCustomerData=function setCustomerData(params){return{type:SET_CUSTOMER_DATA,params:params};};export var showSignupModal=function showSignupModal(){return{type:SHOW_SIGNUP_MODAL};};export var hideSignupModal=function hideSignupModal(){return{type:HIDE_SIGNUP_MODAL};};
